channel.title: What happens if you drink coke and then swallow some mentos
channel.description: i am wondering if what would hapen if you drank 24 oz of coke and then swallowed mentos right after you finish drinking the coke.

item.title: What happens if you drink coke and then swallow some mentos
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

[quote=“cruel, post:10, topic:22968”]I don’t see how you’d shit yourself…
unless you had the runs lol.[/quote]

It creates so much pressure there’s only 2 ways to go out. It defiantly would push some stuff out of your digestive tracks.

Read full topic

item.title: What happens if you drink coke and then swallow some mentos
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

The Carbon Dioxide in the Coke interacts with the Mentos and fizz and when swallowed causes a reaction, this reaction being puking and crapping your pants, so if you do it in a Public Place, make sure you wear brown underwear and a green shirt.

Read full topic
